id: Virus Kills Seven Children at New Jersey Medical Facility
paragraph: November 17, 2018Seven children have died from a severe viral outbreak at a Passaic County medical center, the New Jersey Department of Health said Wednesday.In all, there are 18 confirmed pediatric cases of adenovirus at Wanaque Center for Nursing and Rehabilitation in Haskell, N.J. The for-profit facility provides treatment to medically fragile children, including those using ventilators and feeding tubes, and receiving palliative care. There are 92 pediatric long-term care beds, state data show.WSJ MembershipCustomer ServiceTools & FeaturesAdsMore
